command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/5/f/b/dataset_5fb8a46c-1acb-456a-b5b3-a9712ae35eb0.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&    bcftools annotate         --min-overlap '0.5'  --remove 'FORMAT'                  --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/4/5/1/dataset_451b4cd3-f903-47e3-9243-5083933421db.dat'
